aka: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Murder of Lord Waterbrook
夏洛克福尔摩斯与华生医生 水流老爷之死
this_title: Шерлок Холмс и доктор Ватсон: Убийство лорда Уотербрука
trans_title: 福尔摩斯与华生医生：沃特布鲁克勋爵谋杀案
Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson: The Murder of Lord Waterbrook
夏洛克福尔摩斯与华生医生 水流老爷之死
introduction: In this little Russian animated gem Sherlock Holmes is investigating the strange circumstances concerning the murder of Lord Waterbrook. The parodies, jokes and twisted reality, which is a mark of Aleksandr Bubnov, makes this little short one of the funniest experiences in animation.
chinese_title: 福尔摩斯与华生医生：沃特布鲁克勋爵谋杀案
foreign_title: Шерлок Холмс и доктор Ватсон: Убийство лорда Уотербрука
